ModMetaData.name: Quick Start
ModMetaData.author: Fluffy
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a 'Quick Start' button to the story teller selection.
- If no world, creates a world. - If world has different mod selection, ask for creation. - Choose random starting location. - Choose random pawns. - Starts game.
Takes the game start from 5+ to 2 (or 3) clicks. (Very handy when testing mods!) Also, allows for a truly random start for the adventurous.
[0.12.1]
